text:
Komodo Health | 10+ Roles - Sr. Engineers, Data Scientists, Data Engineers, DevOps, Product Managers | New York City & SF | Full-time, Onsite

TLDR: We are helping reduce the burden of disease using data science and big data techniques. We are a truly data-driven company. Data Scientists, Data Engineers, DevOps, and Full Stack Engineers are key to our mission. Currently 45 engineers and planning to double. Our website currently sucks and does a poor job explaining what we do. Please reach out.

Career Page: https://grnh.se/5ccd0c0d2

Some of the roles we have open (most roles can be in SF or NYC):

Data Science:

* Data Scientist

* Sr. Data Scientist

* Data Analyst

Engineers:

* Sr. Data Engineer

* Sr. DevOps Engineer

* Sr. DevOps Engineer - Security / SecOps

* Data Warehouse Engineer

* Developer Experience & Tools Engineer

* Staff Software Engineer / Architect

* Data Engineer

* Backend Engineer

* Sr. Engineer - React

* Sr. Software Engineer â€¨ Product:

* Sr. Product Manager

* Product Designer

* Product Marketing Manager

Stack: Spark, Airflow, Python, React, Scala, Kubernetes, Docker, AWS, PostgreSQL, Flask, Django
